      • updateIngredient

public void updateIngredient(@PathVariable
                                                                                                    java.lang.Integer ingredientId,
                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                    Ingredient ingredient)
        Updates a current ingredient object
        Parameters:
        ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient to be updated
